resources.string: Record these affirmations to achieve your desires:
More benefits of the Momkey App

string-array.name: settings_array
string-array.item: The best affirmations are those that are spoken with your own voice. The own voice is the subconscious trusts and is therefore not blocked.

In conventional subliminal apps the user does not know, which affirmations are transmitted. With the Monkey app, you can give yourself a targeted program. Your specific needs and desires, you can now program into your subconscious

Go to Main page Record and click on the red record button below. Now you can start to speak your affirmations into your phone with a second break in between. 
 
You should speak with a joyful and euphoric voice. The minimum are 10 different affirmations, more is better. 
 
Then save the recording and go to the Listen page. Here you select the recording and play it. Momkey plays the recording in the continuous loop. 

The more often you hear the affirmations, the better. It is recommended for half an hour every day, of course, with headphones.

string-array.name: affir_array
string-array.item:
• I am rich 
• I am successful 
• I am a money magnet
• I love money
• I have more than enough money

• I am outgoing
• I am confident when meeting new people 
• I enjoy meeting new people 
• Being confident is my natural right 
• I always share my thoughts and feelings

• I love myself and who I am 
• I am happy 
• I am free of depression 
• I find it easy to stay happy 
• I am free of negative thoughts
